import axios from 'axios' import e from 'express' import React from 'react' import "./MyInterests.scss" const APIACTIVITIES = "http://localhost:8080/interests" class MyInterests extends React.Component { state = { id: "", name: "", activities: [], } handleInterests = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios.post(`${APIACTIVITIES}`, { name: e.target.activities.value }) } render () { return ( <>
